system.description:
The gauss rifle uses magnetic induction to propel a projectile at incredible, devastating speeds. Each shot can be “charged” for maximum damage by holding the trigger for a moment before releasing to fire.

A Gauss Rifle can accept one each of the following mods:

  • Barrel: Shielded Barrel
  • Stock: Recoil-Compensating Stock
  • Capacitors: Full Capacitors, Capacitor Boosting Coil
  • Sights: Reflex Sight, Short Scope, Long Scope, Short Night Vision Scope, Long Night Vision Scope, Recon Scope
  • Muzzle: Suppressor
